recipes.dish_name: Meat And Slaw Tailgate Sandwich Recipe
recipes.ingredients: ["1 1/2 lbs. savory cabbage, about 4 c. finely shredded", "3/4 c. + 2 tbsp. mayonnaise", "1 tbsp. Dijon", "Salt & pepper", "2 tomatoes", "1 lg. round loaf crusty bread", "1/2 pound sliced ham", "1/4 pound sliced salami"]
recipes.steps: ["Shred cabbage.", "Combine with 3/4 c. mayonnaise, the mustard, 1/4 tsp.", "salt and 1/8 tsp.", "pepper.", "Slice tomatoes.", "Cut bread in two horizontally about 1\" from the bottom.", "Pull out soft bread leaving top and bottom crust and a 1\" rim around the circumference.", "Spread bottom of bread with remaining 2 Tbsp.", "mayonnaise.", "Cover with ham, salami and tomato slices.", "Pile coleslaw over tomatoes and cover with top of bread.", "Cut into 12 wedges to serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 well-beaten eggs", "1 cup milk", "1 dash salt", "3 tablespoons melted butter", "8 slices white bread", "4 slices cooked chicken", "4 slices monterey jack cheese (thick slices)", "4 slices cheddar cheese (thick slices)", "14 cup oil (vegetable is okay)"]
recipes.steps: ["In shallow baking dish combine eggs, milk, and salt.", "Butter four slices of bread.", "Top buttered bread with chicken and cheese slices.", "Cover with remaining slices of bread.", "In a skillet (I prefer cast iron) heat oil.", "Dip sandwiches carefully in egg mixture and grill in skillet until both sides are golden brown.", "Serve with a side salad or a light soup."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 tablespoon unsalted butter, at room temperature", "1 tablespoon dry grated parmesan cheese", "4 slices whole-wheat sandwich bread", "4 slices processed cheese (about 1/4 lb)", "4 slices swiss cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["In a small bowl, blend butter and Parmesan.", "Arrange bread in sandwich pairs.", "Spread butter mixture on tops and bottoms of pairs.", "Place 2 slices, buttered sides down, on work surface.", "Top each with 1 slice processed cheese, then 2 slices Swiss cheese, then 1 slice processed cheese.", "Top each with a bread slice buttered slice up.", "Using spatula, transfer sandwiches to skillet.", "Heat until bottoms are golden brown and cheeses start to melt, 3-4 minutes.", "Flip.", "Press down gently with spatula.", "Heat until bottoms are golden brown and cheeses have melted.", "Cut each sandwich into 2 triangles."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 slices ham", "2 slices roast pork", "1 slice swiss cheese", "1 slice salami", "2 diced dill pickles or 2 bread and butter pickles", "2 slices Cuban bread or 2 slices French bread or 2 slices Italian bread", "salt", "mustard", "butter or margarine"]
recipes.steps: ["Spread mustard inside 1 slice of bread.", "Layer with ham, pork, cheese and salami.", "Sprinkle with diced pickle and seasonings.", "Butter inside remaining slice of bread if desired.", "Follow directions for sandwich or panini maker."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 pound large asparagus spears", "2 tablespoons olive oil", "Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper", "8 thin slices prosciutto, sliced in half"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.", "Trim the asparagus ends and put them on a sheet pan.", "Add the olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper, to taste.", "Toss to coat.", "Grill the asparagus until tender, rotating on all sides, for about 5 to 10 minutes.", "Remove them from the grill to a platter.", "When cool enough to handle, wrap each asparagus with 1 piece (about 1/2 a slice) of prosciutto.", "Serve immediately or at room temperature."]

recipes.dish_name: Simply Potatoes Open-Faced Break Fast Sandwich #SP5
recipes.ingredients: ["1 12 cups unsalted butter", "1 (20 ounce) package Simply Potatoes Shredded Hash Browns", "8 large cage free brown eggs", "8 slices bread", "1 (10 ounce) jar jam", "2 cups shredded cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["Prep two non-stick 12 inch skillets for cooking by placing 1 tablespoons butter in each skillet and heating butter on medium until melted.", "Crack open 4 eggs(separately) in one skillet and cook side by side (uncovered) until over easy (yolk slightly runny), app.", "3-5 minutes.", "Place 2 cups Simply Potatoes in second skillet, spread evenly in skillet, flatten with a spatula, cook (uncovered) 6-8 minutes, then spread 1 tablespoons butter on top of hash browns, flip sides, and cook another 6-8 minutes or until golden brown.", "While eggs and hash browns are cooking, toast 4 slices of bread of your choice (I used bakery white bread), remove from toaster, place 2 slices per plate (side by side), butter and apply 1 tablespoons of jam or jelly of your choice to buttered bread.", "Remember to check on eggs and hash browns while bread is toasting!", "When done, turn off burner under each skillet.", "Apply 1/2 cup shredded cheese of your choice to top of each slice of buttered and jellied bread.", "Remove eggs from skillet, placing 1 egg per one slice of bread, on top of cheese.", "Remove hash browns from skillet, placing 1/2 cup of hash browns per one slice of bread, on top of egg.", "You may season to your taste; I used no seasoning or condiments.", "(I did place some jam on the side of my plate to use as dip for eggs & hash browns.", ").", "Repeat steps 1-7 and enjoy!"]

recipes.dish_name: Beorge ( Muenster Cheese Wrapped in Phyllo )
recipes.ingredients: ["2 sheets phyllo pastry sheets (1 package)", "1 lb muenster cheese, grated", "2 eggs", "12 lb butter, melted"]
recipes.steps: ["lay out three sheets of pasatry, brush on butter between layers.", "Cut into 5 strips.", "Place 2 Tbs of the cheese that has been mixed with the eggs, onto the end of each strip.", "Fold into a triangle.", "Brush on butter as you go.", "Place on cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes.", "These freeze well and can be baked frozen."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 12 cups coconut, grated", "6 green chilies", "12 cup mint leaf", "salt", "12 fresh bread, slices", "100 g butter", "3 cups fresh low-fat plain yogurt (curd)", "1 teaspoon sugar"]
recipes.steps: ["Grind coconut, green chillies, salt and mint leaves in a mixer.", "Butter one slice of bread generously.", "Spread the ground green chutney over it evenly.", "Cover it with another slice of bread.", "Trim the edges of the bread.", "Cut it into triangle shape.", "Prepare about 6 sets of bread (12 slices= 6 sandwiches) in the same way.", "Arrange them evenly in a deep bowl.", "In another bowl, beat the sugar and yogurt.", "Pour it over the bread.", "Garnish with red chilli powder (to taste) and cilantro (chopped finely).", "Optionally, decorate with sev (either home-made or bought readymade from the market).", "Refrigerate it for half an hour.", "Serve chilled."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 whole Apple", "2 Tablespoons Creamy Peanut Butter", "1 teaspoon Raw Honey", "2 pinches Cinnamon", "6 pieces Chopped Pecans"]
recipes.steps: ["1.", "Cut your whole apple into 4 slices.", "Remove all of the seeds but keep the slices intact.", "2.", "Add you peanut butter onto 2 of your apple slices.", "Add a drizzle of honey over the top.", "Add a few pinches of cinnamon and your chopped nuts.", "Add an apple slice to the top of each.", "Enjoy!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 sprouted wheat tortilla (any type will due)", "1 banana, peeled of course", "1 tablespoon almond butter (more if you use a large tortilla) or 1 tablespoon peanut butter (more if you use a large tortilla)", "1 tablespoon honey (optional)", "14 cup alfalfa sprout", "cinnamon"]
recipes.steps: ["Spread almond/peanut butter (& honey if desired) evenly over the tortilla then sprinkle with cinnamon.", "Lay sprouts over almond/peanut butter then place whole banana in center of tortilla and roll up.", "Enjoy with a side of baby carrots or mandarins!"]

recipes.dish_name: Grilled Portabella Sammies/Sandwiches With Onion Marmalade
recipes.ingredients: ["1 tablespoon olive oil", "4 medium onions, sliced thin", "2 tablespoons red wine vinegar", "3 cups orange juice", "1 teaspoon salt", "1 teaspoon pepper", "2 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce", "2 tablespoons soy sauce", "2 tablespoons chopped parsley", "12 teaspoon garlic powder", "12 teaspoon pepper", "1 teaspoon red wine vinegar", "12 cup extra virgin olive oil", "2 portabella mushroom caps, stems removed", "2 tablespoons mayonnaise", "6 ounces smoked mozzarella cheese", "4 slices multigrain bread"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat the olive oil in a skillet on medium heat and add the onions.", "Sautee until they start to turn clear, then season and add vinegar and orange juice.", "Reduce heat and allow the orange juice to reduce into a jam consistancy, about 45 minutes.", "Meanwhile, mix the Worcestershire, soy sauce, parsley, seasonings, vinegar and olive oil in a plastic storage bag and add the mushrooms.", "Let them marinate for at least 20 minutes.", "Cook the mushrooms on an indoor grill or panini press for 7 minutes (you can also place them under the broil for about 5 minutes on each side).", "Serve on toasted bread with mayo, onion marmalade and mozzarella cheese."]

recipes.ingredients: ["12 cooked chicken, shredded and lightly salted (about 3 cups)", "1 teaspoon salt", "1 teaspoon sugar", "25 g raisins", "25 g blanched almonds", "2 pasilla chiles, peeled,seeded,deveined and presoaked.", "1 mulato chili, peeled seeded,deveined,and presoaked", "2 tablespoons mayonnaise, only for spreading on bread", "12 cup butter, part of it for spreading on bread", "3 peppercorns", "1 whole clove"]
recipes.steps: ["If making sandwiches, spread mayonnaise on one slice of bread and butter on the other slice.", "Sautee chilis and rest of ingredients (except chicken) in part of the butter or a little cooking oil.", "Season with salt and sugar.", "In food processor or blender, process the chilis with the rest of the ingredients, (except chicken) until it becomes a paste.", "Add to the shredded chicken Use as filling for sandwiches or burritos."]

recipes.dish_name: Chik'n Nugget Sandwich with Spicy Mustard Spread
recipes.ingredients: ["1 pkg. (10 oz.) frozen BOCA Original Chikn Veggie Nuggets", "1/4 cup reduced fat mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. brown mustard", "1 small green onion, thinly sliced", "4 hot dog buns", "4 leaf lettuce leaves", "1 small tomato, chopped"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook nuggets as directed on package.", "Meanwhile, mix mayonnaise, mustard and onions.", "Fill buns with lettuce, nuggets, mayonnaise mixture and tomatoes."]

recipes.dish_name: Dean's Crunchy Santa Fe Turkey Deli Sandwich
recipes.ingredients: ["1 loaf Peppridge Farms Deli Flat Buns", "6 slice Santa Fe Turkey Breast", "2 tbsp Fresh Brushetta", "1 slice Large Tomato", "2 stock sweet peppers", "1 pinch Garlic Salt", "1 pinch Crushed Black Pepper", "1 head Head Lettuce", "1 tbsp yellow mustard", "1 pinch parmesan cheese", "2 slice green pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Cover bottom bun with brushetta and add pinch of garlic salt and black pepper.", "Slice sweet peppers and green pepper into stripes and put in non stick pan.", "Lay out turkey into pan once peppers are chard.", "Once turkey is chard too.", "Add one more pinch of garlic salt and black pepper if you wish for taste.", "Then place turkey and peppers on brushetta.", "Top turkey with tomato slice.", "Top with mustard and the head lettuce.", "Then finally top bun.", "Now enjoy the juicy, crunchy delicious healthy sandwich for lunch.", "Good source of protein and fiber."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 frozen BOCA All American Flamed Grilled Veggie Burger", "1/4 cup sliced fresh mushrooms", "1/4 cup thin onion slices", "1/4 cup green pepper strips", "1 tsp. vegetable oil", "1 sandwich roll, split, toasted", "1 slice provolone cheese"]
recipes.steps: ["Cook burger as directed on pkg.", "Meanwhile, cook and stir vegetables in hot oil in nonstick skillet on medium heat 5 min.", "or until crisp-tender.", "Fill roll with burger, vegetable mixture and cheese."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 flour tortilla (6 inch)", "1 Tbsp. MIRACLE WHIP Dressing", "1 lettuce leaf", "2 slices tomato", "6 slices OSCAR MAYER Deli Fresh Smoked Turkey Breast", "1 KRAFT Swiss Singles"]
recipes.steps: ["Spread tortilla with dressing.", "Top with lettuce, tomatoes, turkey and Singles; roll up.", "Serve immediately, or wrap tightly in plastic wrap and refrigerate up to 12 hours."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/4 pound thick cut bacon, diced", "2 sourdough bread loaves (about 1 foot long)", "1 pound pork butt or pork loin, cut in 1/2-inch pieces", "1 pound smoked sausage, sliced 1/4-inch thick", "1/2 pound andouille sausage, sliced 1/4-inch thick", "2 cups chopped red onions", "1 cup julienned red bell peppers", "1 pound boneless chicken thighs, cut in 1/2-inch pieces", "2 celery stalks, thinly sliced", "1 tablespoon minced fresh garlic", "1/4 cup chopped parsley leaves", "1 cup chopped green onions", "1 teaspoon salt", "2 teaspoons freshly cracked black pepper", "2 teaspoons cayenne pepper, or to taste", "1/2 cup water", "1 pound Havarti cheese, thinly sliced"]
recipes.steps: ["In a large cast iron pot, or heavy-bottomed braising pan add the bacon and fry until crisp.", "Remove from the pan and drain on a paper towel.", "Preheat the oven to 200 degrees F. Cut the bread lengthwise and put in the oven.", "Add the pork to the bacon grease, and cook on medium-high heat until the pork is 3/4 cooked.", "Next add the sausages, onions, and bell peppers and cook until the onions are translucent.", "Add the chicken, celery, garlic, parsley, and 3/4 cup green onions.", "Cook until chicken is tender, then season with salt, pepper, and cayenne.", "Stir in the water and combine thoroughly.", "Cover and let sit for 15 minutes.", "Evenly divide the meat mixture and cheese to each loaf.", "Top the cheese with the bacon and remaining green onions.", "Cut the loaves in half and serve."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 slices smoked turkey breast", "2 slices green bell peppers", "1 slice cheddar cheese", "1 each bagels"]
recipes.steps: ["Layer turkey breast, tomato or green pepper and cheese on bottom half of bagel.", "Place top on bagel and cut sandwich in half.", "Place sandwich halves in center of a sheet of wax paper.", "To wrap, bring opposite sides of wax paper together and fold down in tight filds.", "Fold ends of wax paper under sandwich.", "To heat, microwave on HIGH until sandwich is hot, 30 seconds to 1 minute."]

recipes.ingredients: ["250 g butter", "1 teaspoon vanilla essence", "1 cup caster sugar", "4 eggs", "2 cups self-raising flour", "2 tablespoons jam"]
recipes.steps: ["You will also need icing sugar for this recipe.", "Grease 2 deep 20cm round cake pans.", "Cover bases with paper, grease paper.", "Beat butter, essence and sugar in small bowl with electric mixer until mixture is light and fluffy.", "Add eggs 1 at a time, beat well between additions.", "Transfer to large bowl.", "Stir in sifted flour in 2 batches.", "Spread mixture evenly between prepared pans.", "Bake in a moderate oven for about 25 minutes.", "Turn cakes onto wire rack to cool.", "Join cakes with jam.", "Dust cake with a little sifted icing sugar.", "This is best made on the day of serving.", "Can freeze, do not microwave."]

recipes.dish_name: Zippy Dijon Caprese Sandwich by the ClannMaster
recipes.ingredients: ["1 rustic crusty bread (I used a french baguette)", "1 tsp dijon mustard", "1 tsp pesto (can omit if this isn't your thing)", "1 thinly sliced, vine ripe tomato (I used early girl variety from the garden)", "1 bunch basil (fresh)", "5 slice fresh mozzarella (I used bocconcini)", "1 ground pepper", "1 garlic salt", "1 tsp olive oil, extra virgin", "1 tsp apple cider vinegar", "3 French cornichon pickles (for a tasty garnish)", "1 a few slices of Italian sliced salami (not required but super yummy)"]
recipes.steps: ["Collect ingredients.", "Cut a slice of the baguette to your desired length sandwich (approx 5-6\"), then slice the bread long ways leaving the back intact like a hinge.", "Spread dijon mustard and pesto on the bottom slice.", "Thinly slice tomatoes (with the tomatoes laying on their side) and arrange in a layer.", "(A serrated knife works wonders on this task)", "Pull leaves of basil from the stems and arrange in a layer on the tomatoes.", "Slice your mozzarella and form your final layer of the sandwich", "Grind pepper and salt on mozzarella.", "Lightly pour oil and vinegar on the top slice of bread to taste.", "Easy on the vinegar, we don't want soggy bread (I used my own vinaigrette blend I'll share in another recipe)", "Close sandwich, Slice, and enjoy paired with some crunchy cornichons and salami.", "I hope you enjoy this sandwich with your Clann!"]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 (12 ounce) can Spam", "1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened", "13 cup chopped green onion", "2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill", "3 flour tortillas (8-inch)", "1 medium cucumber, peeled and thinly-sliced", "14 cup sunflower seeds", "12 cup alfalfa sprout"]
recipes.steps: ["In bowl, combine SPAM and cream cheese.", "Stir in green onion and dill.", "Spread 1/3 of SPAM mixture evenly over each tortilla.", "Top with 1/3 each cucumber, sunflower seeds, and alfalfa sprouts.", "Roll up tortilla jelly roll fashion and wrap in plastic wrap.", "Repeat with remaining tortillas.", "Refrigerate 2 hours.", "To serve, cut each roll in half."]

recipes.ingredients: ["3 slices bread, any", "1/4 lb turkey sliced lunch meat", "2 slices cheese any", "4 slices tomatoes", "2 slices lettuce", "2 slices bacon cooked", "to taste mayonnaise", "to taste salt & black pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Spread mayonnaise on two slices of bread.", "Add one slice of bacon to the bread (cut in half).", "Add half of the lunch meat to each slice of bread then top with one slice of cheese.", "Add two slices of tomato to each half and sprinkle with salt and pepper.", "Then place the lettuce on top.", "Add mayonnaise to the third piece of bread.", "Place on one half of the sandwich and add mayonnaise to the other side.", "Place the two sandwich half's together and secure with 4 long toothpicks.", "Make your first cut corner to corner of a sandwich.", "Then make a cross cuts.", "Pick up 1/4 of the sandwich and this place a long toothpick from the bottom thougth the top.", "Do each 1/4 in turn with a long toothpick from the bottom.", "Can be served with pickles & potato chips, french fries, coleslaw or potato salad."]

recipes.dish_name: Grilled Cheese, Pickle and Vidalia Onion Sandwich
recipes.ingredients: ["3 tablespoons softened butter", "2 slices whole wheat bread", "2 slices sharp Cheddar cheese", "1 dill pickle, sliced", "2 thin slices Vidalia or other sweet onion"]
recipes.steps: ["Butter one side of each slice of bread with 1 tablespoon of butter.", "Melt the remaining tablespoon of butter in a skillet over medium heat.", "Place one bread slice butter-side-down into the skillet, and top with the Cheddar cheese, pickle slices, and onion.", "Place the remaining slice of bread butter-side-up onto the sandwich.", "Cook until crispy and golden brown on both sides, 5 to 7 minutes."]

recipes.dish_name: Gorgonzola and Mache Sandwiches (Tramezzini con Gorgonzola e Gallinella)
recipes.ingredients: ["1/4 pound Italian Gorgonzola cheese, at room temperature", "3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil", "1/4 pound mache (lamb's lettuce), roots trimmed, leaves washed and dried", "8 slices firm-textured white bread, crusts trimmed"]
recipes.steps: ["Put the Gorgonzola in a small bowl and break it into small pieces with a fork.", "Add the olive oil and mash until creamy.", "Put the mache in a bowl.", "Add the creamed Gorgonzola, a little at a time, turning the leaves gently with a fork until evenly coated.", "Mound one-fourth of the mache and Gorgonzola filling in the center of each of 4 slices of bread; top with the other slices.", "Position a sharp knife diagonally across the slice of bread; hold the bread down with your other hand so as not to flatten the filling and quickly slice the sandwich to produce two tramezzini."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 whole grain sandwich rolls, split", "1 large carrot, shredded", "1 12 cups fresh spinach leaves, chopped", "12 cup pre-shredded mozzarella cheese (substitute fresh or vegan mozzarella)", "1 tablespoon margarine", "12 teaspoon garlic powder (or to taste)", "14 teaspoon fresh nutmeg"]
recipes.steps: ["Spread margarine on both bun halves and sprinkle with garlic powder.", "Arrange on a cookie sheet sprayed with non-stick spray.", "Divide spinach over all 4 bun halves.", "Top with shredded carrot, then mozzarella.", "Grate nutmeg over the cheese, and sprinkle with additional garlic powder, if desired.", "Bake at for 400F until mozzarella is bubbly and golden.", "Assemble sandwich halves and serve immediately.", "Grill Variation: Sandwiches may be prepared, assembled and wrapped in foil, then put on medium heat grill for 15-20 minutes, turning frequently, until bread is toasted on the outside, and sandwich is heated through.", "Open face/ Pizza variation: Assemble as above on a small (6\") prepared pizza crust (ie: Boboli)."]

recipes.ingredients: ["8 slices whole wheat bread, toasted", "1/4 cup KRAFT Real Mayo Mayonnaise", "12 oz.", "2 cucumbers, sliced", "4 chewy fruit-filled cookies", "4 cups red or green grapes", "32 fl oz (4 cups) fat-free milk"]
recipes.steps: ["Build each sandwich with 2 slices bread, 1 Tbsp.", "mayonnaise, 3 oz.", "turkey, and 1/4 of the cucumbers.", "Enjoy each sandwich with 1 fig bar and 1 cup grapes on the side.", "Serve each person an 8 fl oz glass of milk with the meal."]

recipes.dish_name: Ouzo Spiced Pears Wrapped in Puff Pastry
recipes.ingredients: ["6 large pears, cored and peeled but stems intact", "3 teaspoons sugar", "3 teaspoons cinnamon", "12 teaspoon grated nutmeg", "34 teaspoon ground fennel", "1 pinch black pepper", "2 tablespoons raisins", "2 tablespoons ouzo", "3 tablespoons butter", "1 sheet puff pastry, cut into 6 rectangles", "1 egg, lightly beaten together with", "1 tablespoon water"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 400 degrees.", "Mix sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, fennel seed, pepper, raisins,ouzo & butter.", "Stuff a little of the spice mixture into each pear, pressing it inches.", "Cut each rectangle of puff pastry into an \"X\" shape.", "Place pear in center of each \"X\" and bring up the sides and wrap, overlapping and sealing with a little water.", "Shape leaves out of left-over pastry and adhere to pears with a little water.", "Brush with egg wash and bake on a parchment lined baking sheet for about 20 minutes, or until golden."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 tablespoons peanut butter", "2 slices bread", "1 strawberry (a good sized one)", "2 tablespoons strawberry jelly"]
recipes.steps: ["On one slice of bread spread the peanut butter and strawberry spread.", "Cut strawberry into thin slices (start from the bottom).", "After cutting strawberry place slices all over that one slice of bread."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 large package (8 ounces) cream cheese, preferably, without gum additives, at room temperature", "1 tablespoon unsalted butter, at room temperature", "1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon", "16 slices very thinly sliced white bread", "1 cup ripe strawberries", "Granulated sugar"]
recipes.steps: ["In a bowl, cream together the cream cheese and butter with the cinnamon until soft and smooth.", "Lightly spread the cream cheese on all of the bread slices.", "Hull the strawberries and thinly slice.", "Arrange the slices on 8 slices of the bread, covering the entire surface.", "Lightly sprinkle the berries with granulated sugar and top each sandwich with a remaining slice of bread.", "Trim off the crusts and cut the sandwiches into 4 triangles."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 whole Cucumber, Peeled", "3 Tablespoons Oil", "2 Cider Vinegar", "18 teaspoons Black Pepper", "10 slices White Bread", "Butter (for The Bread)"]
recipes.steps: ["Cut the peeled cucumber into 20 slices 1/8 thick.", "Combine the oil, vinegar and pepper.", "Soak the cucumber slices in the oil mixture.", "Flatten the white bread a little with a rolling pin.", "Butter the slices of bread.", "Punch out 4 rounds per slice of bread with a round pastry cutter that is the size of the diameter of the cucumber.", "To assemble the sandwiches, take a slice of cucumber and let the excess oil drip off.", "Then sandwich between 2 rounds of the buttered bread."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 tsp. Miracle Whip Original Spread", "2 tsp. Kraft Creamy Caesar Dressing", "1/2 cup torn salad greens", "2 slices whole wheat bread, toasted", "6 slices thinly shaved smoked turkey breast", "2 tomato slices Safeway 1 lb For $1.29 thru 02/09", "1 Kraft Singles Swiss Cheese Slice Target 2 For $5.00 thru 02/06"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix Miracle Whip and dressing in small bowl.", "Pour over salad greens in large bowl; toss to coat.", "Cover 1 of the toast slices with the turkey, greens mixture, tomato and Singles; top with the remaining toast slice."]

recipes.ingredients: ["8 slices white bread", "2 eggs", "1/2 cup (125 ml) milk", "1/2 tsp (2 ml) salt", "pinch of black pepper", "turkey breast, sliced", "4 slices cooked ham", "4 slices swiss cheese", "prepared mustard", "butter for frying", "raspberry or strawberry jam, for dipping (optional)", "powdered sugar, for dipping (optional)"]
recipes.steps: ["Cut crusts from bread.", "Beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper.", "Dip bread slices in mixture.", "Drain.", "Arrange some thin slices of turkey on four bread slices.", "Cover with slice of ham.", "Top with slice of cheese.", "Spread lightly with mustard.", "Cover with remaining bread.", "Press down well.", "Cut across diagonally.", "Heat butter in skillet.", "Fry sandwiches until brown and crisp; turning once.", "Serve with jam and powdered sugar, if desired."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 slice bread", "2 slice American, Swiss, or Provolone cheese", "2 slice tomato (optional)", "1 tbsp butter or margarine"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat oven to 350F", "Butter each slice of bread on one side", "Place one slice of bread butter side down on a foil-covered baking sheet.", "Place cheese on top of bread slice", "Place tomato slices on top of cheese (you can skip this step, or use ham, turkey, or whatever you like instead).", "Place the other slice of bread on top, butter side up.", "Bake in the oven for five minutes.", "Flip the sandwich, and bake for another five minutes, or until both sides are golden brown.", "Enjoy!"]

recipes.dish_name: Radish Tea Sandwiches with Miso Yogurt
recipes.ingredients: ["1/2 cup fat-free plain Greek yogurt", "1 1/2 tablespoons white miso", "4 small slices of pumpernickel bread, crusts removed", "8 radishes, thinly sliced", "Radish sprouts and toasted sesame seeds, for garnish"]
recipes.steps: ["In a medium bowl, mix the yogurt with the white miso.", "Spread the mixture on the bread, then arrange the radish slices on top.", "Garnish the sandwiches with radish sprouts and toasted sesame seeds."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for brushing", "1 medium red onion, thinly sliced", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "1 head of broccoli (about 1 1/4 lbs), tender stems and florets only, coarsely chopped", "1 cup pitted green olives, coarsely chopped", "2 medium tomatoes, coarsely chopped", "Salt and freshly ground pepper", "2 cups shredded sharp cheddar (6 ounces)", "2 cups shredded Monterey Jack (6 ounces)", "8 pocketless pitas"]
recipes.steps: ["In a large skillet, heat the 1/4 cup of olive oil.", "Add the onion and garlic and cook over moderate heat until softened, about 4 minutes.", "Stir in the broccoli, cover and cook over moderate heat until just tender, about 4 minutes.", "Stir in the olives and tomatoes and season with salt and pepper.", "Brush one side of the pitas with olive oil.", "Mix the chedder and Monterey Jack cheese.", "Heat a cast iron skillet, remove from the heat and add one of the pitas, oiled side down.", "Scatter 1/2 cup of the cheese on the pita.", "Spoon one-fourth of the broccoli mixture over the cheese and top with another scatter another 1/2 cup of cheese.", "Top with another pita, oiled-side up and return the skillet to the heat.", "Set a small heavy skillet on top of the sandwich and cook over moderate heat until pita is browned and crisp and the cheese is melted, about 2 minutes per side.", "Transfer the sandwich to a work surface.", "Repeat with the remaining pitas, cheeses and filling.", "Cut the sandwiches into 4 wedges and serve right away."]

recipes.dish_name: Turkey Brie and Cherry Grilled Sandwich
recipes.ingredients: ["8 ounces, weight Brie", "4 Tablespoons Butter", "8 slices Your Favorite Bread", "1 pound Deli Turkey, Sliced Thin", "1 cup Cherries, Sliced"]
recipes.steps: ["Slice the brie so that you have approximately 4 to 5 slices per sandwich.", "Butter one side of each of the slices of bread.", "Place the bread buttered side down on a hot griddle, pan or electric skillet (whichever method you use to toast up your sandwiches).", "On top of this slice, layer the turkey, cherries, and the brie.", "Place a slice of buttered bread on top of the layers.", "Grill to perfection on both sides, making sure that the brie is melted."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 slices light white bread", "1 tsp. GREY POUPON Hearty Spicy Brown Mustard", "1 KRAFT Slim Cut Swiss Cheese Slice", "6 slices OSCAR MAYER Deli Fresh Honey Smoked Turkey Breast", "1/4 tsp. freshly cracked black pepper", "1 lettuce leaf", "2 tomato slices King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09"]
recipes.steps: ["Spread 1 bread slice with mustard.", "Top with cheese and turkey; sprinkle with pepper.", "Cover with lettuce, tomatoes and remaining bread slice."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 slices multi-grain bread", "2 Kraft Singles Light Cheese Slice Target 2 For $5.00 thru 02/06", "2 thin slices tomato King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09", "2 tsp. non-hydrogenated margarine", "1/2 cup baby carrots Target 2 lb For $3.00 thru 02/06", "1/2 cup sugar snap peas"]
recipes.steps: ["Top 1 of the bread slices with Singles and tomatoes; cover with remaining bread slice.", "Spread outside of sandwich with margarine.", "Cook in skillet on medium heat 2 to 3 min.", "on each side or until golden brown on both sides.", "Serve with vegetables."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 eggs", "1/4 cup whole milk", "1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon", "4 slices raisin bread", "1 tablespoon butter, plus more for topping", "1/2 cup prepared apple pie filling", "Powdered sugar, for garnishing, optional"]
recipes.steps: ["In a large baking dish, whisk eggs, milk, and cinnamon.", "Set aside.", "Place the bread slices in the egg mixture.", "Let soak until the egg mixture is completely absorbed into the bread, turning over occasionally, for 1 to 2 minutes.", "Heat a griddle over medium low heat.", "Add the butter and melt.", "Cook the bread on the griddle until brown and heated through, about 2 to 4 minutes per side.", "Make 2 sandwiches with the bread and apple pie filling.", "Cut each sandwich in half.", "Transfer to plates and serve with additional butter.", "Top with powered sugar, if desired."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 teaspoon olive oil", "1 onion, chopped", "1 teaspoon italian seasoning", "1 tablespoon water", "14 cup ripe olives, sliced (preferably Kalamata)", "2 tablespoons parmesan cheese, grated", "7 fresh spinach leaves", "2 French rolls", "1 lowfat mozzarella cheese, sliced thinly", "1 plum tomato, large,sliced lengthwise"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat oil in large nonstick skillet.", "Add onion and italian seasoning.", "Cook and stir 2 minutes.", "Add water.", "Reduce to low, cover and cook 5 minutes until onion is tender.", "Remove from heat, stir in olives and parmesan.", "Arrange 2 to 3 spinach leaves on bottom half of each roll.", "Spoon half the onion mixture onto each, top with cheese slices and tomato slices.", "Top with spinach leaves and top half of roll.", "Wrap tightly and refrigerate until ready to eat."]

recipes.ingredients: ["KRAFT Real Mayo Mayonnaise or MIRACLE WHIP Dressing", "flour tortilla", "KRAFT Singles", "OSCAR MAYER Smoked Ham*", "CLAUSSEN Kosher Dill Sandwich Slices*", "lettuce (optional)"]
recipes.steps: ["Spread mayo on tortilla.", "Top with lettuce, pickles, process cheese food and ham.", "Fold up sides of tortilla to center, slightly overlapping.", "Secure with garnished toothpick, if desired.", "Wrap in plastic wrap.", "Refrigerate until ready to serve."]

recipes.dish_name: Portabella Sandwich With Garlic and Lemon
recipes.ingredients: ["12 teaspoon butter or 12 teaspoon margarine", "2 portabella mushrooms, cleaned, stems removed, and thinly sliced", "salt, to taste", "1 garlic clove, minced", "1 tablespoon lemon juice", "pepper, to taste", "4 slices thick multi-grain bread or 4 slices Italian bread", "1 ripe tomatoes, sliced", "10 arugula leaves"]
recipes.steps: ["Melt butter in skillet over medium heat.", "Add mushroom slices and sautee until brown and juicy (about 10 minutes).", "Add salt and cool.", "Combine lemon juice and pepper (it's also good with a little melted butter mixed in).", "Pour mixture over lightly toasted bread.", "Add mushroom, tomato, and arugula, and top with remaining bread."]

recipes.ingredients: ["6 medium tomatoes, peeled", "2 medium cucumbers, thinly sliced", "12 cup salad oil", "14 cup dry white wine", "14 cup white wine vinegar", "2 teaspoons snipped chives", "1 teaspoon snipped parsley", "1 teaspoon sugar", "1 teaspoon dried dried herbs", "18 teaspoon ground pepper"]
recipes.steps: ["Sprinkle tomatoes lightly with salt.", "Place whole tomatoes and sliced cucumbers in a large bowl.", "Combine salad oil, white wine, white wine vinegar, chives, parsley, sugar, salad herbs and pepper in a screw top jar.", "Cover and shake vigorously.", "Pour over veggies.", "Cover and chill several hours or over night.", "Turn tomatoes once or twice.", "Remove tomatoes from the marinade.", "Wrap each tomato in a piece of heavy duty foil.", "Grill over med heat until heated through, about 20 minutes, turning once.", "Drain cucumbers, reserving marinade to store leftovers inches.", "Serve cucumbers on top of tomatoes."]

recipes.ingredients: ["14 lb ground beef", "14 lb bulk Italian sausage", "14 teaspoon pepper", "8 ounces tomato sauce", "12 teaspoon sugar", "14 teaspoon italian seasoning", "18 teaspoon garlic powder", "2 hot dog buns"]
recipes.steps: ["Mix ground beef, sausage and pepper.", "Shape into 6 meatballs.", "Place in a 2 quart casserole; cover with wax paper.", "Microwave at HIGH for 2-3 minutes, or until no longer pink, stirring once or twice.", "Drain.", "Stir in tomato sauce, sugar, Italian seasoning, garlic powder and pepper.", "Cover with wax paper.", "Reduce to 50% power.", "Microwave 3-5 minutes, or until flavors blend.", "Spoon into hot dog buns."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 large avocado", "1/4 tsp salt", "1/2 tsp ground black pepper", "1/4 tsp garlic salt", "1 tsp white vinegar", "8 slice your favourite bread", "2 tbsp butter"]
recipes.steps: ["Mash the avocado, salt, pepper, garlic salt and vinegar together.", "Butter the bread and spread avocado mixture on 4 slices.", "Close with the other bread, cut and serve.", "You can also use it for a dip."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 quail", "4 slices bacon", "1 tablespoon butter or 1 tablespoon margarine", "14 cup lemon juice", "12 cup hot water", "13 cup chopped mushroom", "toast or rice", "gravy"]
recipes.steps: ["Prepare quail.", "Wrap bacon around each quail, securing with skewers or toothpicks.", "Put birds in shallow buttered pan; cover and bake at 350 F.", ",about 30 minutes, basting with mixture of lemon juice and water.", "When birds are tender, remove from oven.", "Add mushrooms and heat.", "Serve on toast or rice with gravy."]

recipes.ingredients: ["2 cups lentils", "1 teaspoon salt", "1 teaspoon oil", "3 onions", "1 small green chili pepper", "1 garlic clove", "coriander seeds or ground coriander", "clove", "cinnamon", "ginger", "poppy seed", "1 teaspoon cumin", "18 teaspoon turmeric"]
recipes.steps: ["Simmer lentils in water with salt and 1 tsp oil.", "Place chopped onions and chile, peeled garlic clove and spices in blender.", "Grind.", "Fry this in oil, then add cumin and tumeric, stirring until oil separates.", "Add a little salt.", "Mix with the cooked lentils, boil for ten minutes.", "cook's hints: remove and discard chile seeds with the end of a potato parer while wearing plastic gloves.", "I like serrano chile.", "keep your mouth shut while chopping onions and you won't cry."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 14-ounce can artichoke hearts, drained and finely chopped", "5 ounces feta cheese, crumbled", "3/4 cup mayonnaise", "1/2 cup grated Parmesan cheese", "1 2-ounce jar pimientos, drained and diced", "2 teaspoons minced garlic", "Pita chips or Melba toast, for dipping"]
recipes.steps: ["Preheat the oven to 350F.", "In a medium bowl, stir together the artichoke hearts, feta cheese, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, pimientos, and garlic until thoroughly combined.", "Transfer the mixture to a small casserole or glass pie plate and bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes, or until lightly browned.", "To serve, place the dish on a larger platter and surround with pita chips or Melba toast."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 1/2 cups milk", "1 teaspoon butter", "1/4 cup sugar", "1/4 teaspoon cinnamon", "2 cups white rice", "2 egg yolks", "1 orange, zested", "1 lemon, zested", "1/4 cup currants, reconstituted in rum for 10 minutes"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat the milk in a sauce pan on low with the butter, sugar and cinnamon.", "Mix in rice and let simmer for 30 minutes.", "Using a whisk, whisk in egg yolks and zests.", "Strain the currants, discarding the rum.", "Add the currants to the rice and serve hot."]

recipes.ingredients: ["4 yellow squash (1-1/2 lb.), cut into 1/4-inch-thick slices", "1-1/2 cups KRAFT Shredded Triple Cheddar Cheese with a TOUCH OF PHILADELPHIA", "3/4 cup KRAFT Creamy Italian Dressing", "1/2 cup chopped red onions", "1 egg, beaten", "1 tsp. Italian seasoning", "16 round buttery crackers, crushed"]
recipes.steps: ["Heat oven to 350 degrees F.", "Combine all ingredients except cracker crumbs in 2-qt.", "casserole.", "Top with cracker crumbs.", "Bake 30 min.", "or until heated through."]

recipes.ingredients: ["1 baguette", "1 can (28 oz / 796 mL) Primo Diced Tomatoes, drained", "1 clove garlic, minced", "2 Tbsp. fresh basil, chopped", "1/4 cup Kraft Roasted Red Pepper with Parmesan Dressing"]
recipes.steps: ["Just follow our 3 simple steps", "Slice baguette into 1/2-inch pieces and place on baking sheet.", "Broil each side until browned.", "Stir together 1 can (28 oz / 796 mL) drained Primo Diced Tomatoes, 1/4 cup Kraft Roasted Red Pepper With Parmesan Dressing, 1 minced garlic clove and 2 Tbsp.", "chopped fresh basil.", "Top each baguette slice with about 1/2 Tbsp.", "tomato mixture."]
